channel.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
channel.description:
I don't specialise in Java development, but I got 90% on my programming exam (which involves programming in Java, naming variables, definitions of programs).
I specialise in mobile apps and web development (I am fluent in PHP, Javascript, Ajax, using MySQL databases).
I don't know how arcanists work and how the client communicates with its servers or what kind of database it uses.
Can someone crack arcanists? I am willing to be a coder and set up an arcanists private server. There are many improvements to be made. For example, the person who gets first turn should have 35 less HP to make the game fair.
If PHP may be used, then I am incredibly fluent with PHP and handling MySQL databases. I am also fluent in SQL.

item.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

wow you are very smart well done

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
item.dc:creator: @Quarks Quarks
item.description:
@Quarks wrote:

I can probably make the server-side code given the correct parameters and client. If I could just get the de-obfuscated code of the client, I could try creating the server-side code.

I will then probably hire someone to change all the sprites (images) and invest a lot in advertising it. But, no-one seems to be able to help me.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:14, topic:544194”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=663076.msg4432346#msg4432346 date=1403802079]

People have stolen RuneScape code successfully. Why not Arcanists?

My offer is still there; otherwise I will probably try do it myself in the summer holidays and work alone without any team or partner…

I don’t remember anyone stealing RS code.

What do you think the client you’re using is?
[/quote]

I know that, I think he’s talking about server code not client.[/quote]
Why would he make a server if he hasn’t got the client?

Is the cache really 5mb?

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537289.msg3928441.html#msg3928441

I dunno why the interest in the game spiked all of a sudden. For the past year or so I’ve gotten a PM/email every few weeks asking if I still have the deob or if I will join an Arcanists private server team or deob the client again for someone.

Quick answer: no. I do not have the client anymore and I do not want to join a team to make the server and I do not really care enough about it to deob the client again.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

I’m interested in nabbing the physics from the client for my own spin off. Davidi2 might still have the deob.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
item.dc:creator: @Quarks Quarks
item.description:
@Quarks wrote:

All right, if anyone is able to, please contact me. I am willing to pay for the servers and everything and split the profit (after running costs) if you help me with it.

We will share the game. I will program anything that is required (in PHP), for instance, a highscores list.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Hack/copy arcanists code
item.dc:creator: @Quarks Quarks
item.description:
@Quarks wrote:

asshole_rule:

yeah you do seem very well qualified, not everyone is capable of 90’s on their programming exams

[quote=“Limits, post:3, topic:544194”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=663076.msg4431475#msg4431475 date=1403450191]
yeah you do seem very well qualified, not everyone is capable of 90’s on their programming exams
[/quote]
Yeah, what he said. You are clearly very well certified to be a coder and you should be proud of yourself.[/quote]
Sorry, I didn’t mean to brag but I want someone to have faith in me when they work with me. But, I did work hard in my exams as programming is one of my favourite things.

[quote=“Death Style, post:4, topic:544194”]I’ve played with Arcanists and it’s pretty bad IMO.

I’ve just gone the route of creating my own spin off.

[/quote]
Nice, I guess that’s what I will have to do if no-one is able to steal the source from Arcanists.

Read full topic
